wake up.Text: Or more like good afternoon, now. You slept for a while.

wake up.Name: Kai
wake up.Text: You're in my room! That's Kai's room, by the way. I'm Kai.

wake up.Name: Kai
wake up.Text: Anyways, care to explain what you were doing sleeping the day away by that elm tree?
... I literally have no idea what you're talking about.

wake up.Name: Kai
wake up.Text: You don't know? What do you know then?

wake up.Name: Kai
wake up.Text: Well what on Earth am I going to call you then? Hm...

wake up.Name: Kai
wake up.Text: I'll call you Elm. Last name Tree. I hereby dub thee Elm Tree.

knife lost.Name: Kai
knife lost.Text: You know, after dragging you back from the forest, I seem to have misplaced my hunting knife.

knife lost.Name: Kai
knife lost.Text: Haha, you couldn't tell? Yeah, I'm one of the village hunters.

knife lost.Name: Kai
knife lost.Text: Not much of a hunter anymore though. What's a hunter without a hunting knife?

knife lost.Name: Kai
knife lost.Text: No! You don't understand. That knife was a gift from my grandfather! My pride and joy. My flesh and blood.

knife lost.Name: Elm
knife lost.Text: (Hm. He did help me out by bringing me to his place. Maybe I should help him.)

knife lost.Name: Elm
knife lost.Text: Where did you see it last?

knife lost.Name: Kai
knife lost.Text: Well, I definitely had it when I found you. Scared off a wolf that was nearby.

knife lost.Name: Elm
knife lost.Text: Maybe you dropped it on your way back then?
